# uniqueIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The action set’s unique identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
var uniqueIdentifier: UUID { get }
```

## Identifiying an action set

- **name**: The name of the action set.
- **updateName(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the name of the action set.

items.description: The name of the action set.
items.name: name

items.description: Updates the name of the action set.
items.name: updateName(_:completionHandler:)
